review: I had a operation, it was a good experience with the doctor, he was very professional and polite, he explained clearly about the problem, ** **** * **** ********** coming to operation it was very smooth and fine it went good, after operation we had some medication, we are completely satisfied.
Doctor.. Very very clear explanation and diagnosis the problems in which particularly dot clear speech. Very satisfied treatments. Nice Dr.
I  visited for rivision hip replacement the doctor was kind and good hearted he sucessfully handled by case  for 100 percent result I thought he is my god   thanks a lot sir   for ur treatment
Very patient, neat diagnosis and well explained.  Made us feel very comfortable.Will have no hesitation in recommending this centre to friends.

I had taken my dad with a chronic  back ache. Doctor was extremely kind in understanding his problem and attended to all the aspects of his complaint. He was given the right treatment at the right time and he even followed us up after a couple of days to know the status of his previously existing symptoms. In this busy day and age to find such an empathetic doctor was such a blessing

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He came late after surgery, which is quite usual with surgeons, but the wait was well worth. He grasped the problem quickly and explained the problem and the treatment protocol and gave prescription and called physiotherapist to stay ,as it was closing time,and asked him to attend her shoulder. His treatment and cordial behaviour was very satisfactory and I would recommend this young but efficient doctor for those who suffer with pain in any joint.
